data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Isabela, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Isabela, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Isabela, Puerto Rico.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 13,168 believers in the state of Isabela the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Isabela, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Isabela
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Isabela, Isabela, Puerto Rico.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Isabela against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Isabela, Puerto Rico. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Isabela to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
